chrome_font_settings

Top-Level Variables
font_settings: ChromeFontSettings
Classes
ChromeFontSettings

Use the chrome.fontSettings API to manage Chrome's font settings.

Top-Level Variables

static final ChromeFontSettings font_settings

Class ChromeFontSettings

Fields

onDefaultFontSizeChanged: Stream
onFontChanged: Stream
onMinimumFontSizeChanged: Stream

Getters and Setters

Stream<dynamic> get onDefaultFixedFontSizeChanged

Fired when the default fixed font size setting changes.

Stream<dynamic> get onDefaultFontSizeChanged

Fired when the default font size setting changes.

Stream<dynamic> get onFontChanged

Fired when a font setting changes.

Stream<dynamic> get onMinimumFontSizeChanged

Fired when the minimum font size setting changes.

Methods

void clearDefaultFixedFontSize(dynamic details, dynamic callback)

Clears the default fixed font size set by this extension, if any. details This parameter is currently unused.

void clearDefaultFontSize(dynamic details, dynamic callback)

Clears the default font size set by this extension, if any. details This parameter is currently unused.

void clearFont(dynamic details, dynamic callback)

Clears the font set by this extension, if any.

void clearMinimumFontSize(dynamic details, dynamic callback)

Clears the minimum font size set by this extension, if any. details This parameter is currently unused.

void getDefaultFixedFontSize(dynamic details, dynamic callback)

Gets the default size for fixed width fonts. details This parameter is currently unused.

void getDefaultFontSize(dynamic details, dynamic callback)

Gets the default font size.

details This parameter is currently unused.

void getFont(dynamic details, dynamic callback)

Gets the font for a given script and generic font family.

void getFontList(dynamic callback)

Gets a list of fonts on the system.

void getMinimumFontSize(dynamic details, dynamic callback)

Gets the minimum font size.

details This parameter is currently unused.

void setDefaultFixedFontSize(dynamic details, dynamic callback)

Sets the default size for fixed width fonts.

void setDefaultFontSize(dynamic details, dynamic callback)

Sets the default font size.

void setFont(dynamic details, dynamic callback)

Sets the font for a given script and generic font family.

void setMinimumFontSize(dynamic details, dynamic callback)

Sets the minimum font size.
